summary: An American girl, sent to the English countryside to stay with relatives, finds love and purpose while fighting for her survival as war envelops the world around her.
cast: Saoirse Ronan|Tom Holland|George MacKay|Harley Bird|Danny McEvoy|Anna Chancellor|Jonathan Rugman|Corey Johnson|Darren Morfitt|Stella Gonet|Des McAleer|Sophie Stanton|Natasha Jonas|Nav Sidhu|Amy Dawson|Mark Stanley|Paul Ronan|Tony Arvanitis|Danielle Britten|Sabrina Dickens|Josh Dyer|Sophie Ellis|Paul Fitzpatrick|Julian Gillard|Semina Lewis|Colin Oliver|Nick Pratt|Julian Price|Boyd Rogers|Clive Shaw|Gavin Sims|Clem So|Carl Sykes
title: Mi vida ahora
